definition: camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin
viral marketing/see also 病毒營銷|病毒营销[bing4 du2 ying2 xiao1]
viral marketing/see also 病毒營銷|病毒营销[bing4 du2 ying2 xiao1]

sentences.english: More dramatic is the introduction of goal-driven search engine marketing campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 更戲劇性的是，目標驅動的搜索引擎營銷活動的介紹。

sentences.english: This text uses the general method, have confirmed Ferranini's marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 本文用一般方法，確定了法尼尼家居中心的營銷戰略。

sentences.english: We should establish a customer demands value-driven distribution intellectual model.
sentences.chinese: 應建立以顧客的需求價值爲核心的營銷心智模式。

sentences.english: First, the starting point of marketing is wet.
sentences.chinese: 第一，營銷的始點是溼的。

sentences.english: How much alloted for annual marketing efforts in total?
sentences.chinese: 每年你可用於營銷活動的費用分配是多少？

sentences.english: The marketing schemes of mini-type and medium-sized enterprises are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了中小塗料企業市場營銷佈局的經驗。

sentences.english: This paper takes Hongta Company as target, research their marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 本文以紅塔公司爲對象，對其營銷策略進行研究。

sentences.english: Don’t ever let an advertising sales rep teach you anything about marketing.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓一個廣告銷售代表教你任何有關營銷的事情。

sentences.english: But to do so would be bad marketing.
sentences.chinese: 但這樣做會很糟糕的營銷。

sentences.english: The marketing strategy of Taobao makes it easy for customers to know the brand information.
sentences.chinese: 淘寶網的營銷活動向目標受衆準確傳達了品牌信息。

sentences.english: Thank you notes are not only about good  etiquette but self-marketing, too.
sentences.chinese: 感謝字條不僅僅是一種禮貌也是一種自我營銷。

sentences.english: But the strategy is not without some risk.
sentences.chinese: 但社交媒體營銷策略也並非沒有風險。

sentences.english: What of concerns that we are sacrificing our privacy to marketers?
sentences.chinese: 將我們的隱私呈獻給市場營銷者有何意義？

sentences.english: Establish train of thought of benefit first sale, variable quantity for benefit model countermeasure.
sentences.chinese: 樹立效益第一的營銷思路，變數量型爲效益型的對策。

sentences.english: You're great at sales, but I know you know something about computers too.
sentences.chinese: 你精通營銷，但是我知道你也懂得一些電腦知識。

sentences.english: Provide the admin and protocol and co-brand for your marketing team.
sentences.chinese: 提供管理員和協議爲您的營銷團隊和合作的品牌。

definition: e-commerce (abbr. for 電子商務|电子商务[dian4 zi3 shang1 wu4])/(old) to negotiate by telegram or telephone
to be in operation/to do business/(of train, bus etc) to be in service/operation/service
to plot/to scheme/to bring about/to engineer/planning/producer/planner
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
